nascent: Only functional, reactive research is in place.
emerging: Basic secondary research is used to inform needs assessments upfront.
expanding: Research is a requirement to inform needs assessment and/or programme design.
optimising: There are defined research requirements in relation to Impact Measurement.
mature: There are defined research standards in relation to Impact Measurement.

emerging: Additional research is commissioned on an ad hoc basis.
expanding: The internal research competency is limited and/or inconsistent.
optimising: There is consistent support to ensure quality research resulting in accessible products for relevant stakeholders.
mature: There is consistent review and improvement of the knowledge and insights products and processes.
